definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
lit. light mouth, thin tongue (idiom); hasty and rude/caustic and sharp-tongued
see 拈花惹草[nian1 hua1 re3 cao3]
lit. when the ship arrives at the bridge we can deal with the problem/no point in worrying about sth until it actually happens (idiom)
pinyin: chuan2 dao4 qiao2 men2 zi4 hui4 zhi2

definition: to poke one's head in and pry (idiom); to spy/nosy
to make known to every household (idiom); to disseminate widely/to shout from the rooftops
lit. set out and it becomes spring (idiom); to effect a miracle cure (of medical operation)/to bring back the dead/once it starts, everything goes well
variant of 心拙口笨[xin1 zhuo1 kou3 ben4]
to put on an act (idiom); to pose/to show theatrical affectation/to indulge in histrionics
verbose or unclear in speech/rambling and indistinct
